page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The area covered by this block includes the districts of Sherwood,New Basford,Mapperley,Mapperley Park, Carlton,Carrington and Woodthorpe.The area is largely residential with some pockets of industry.Though mainly private,some council housing is included. The following pages of text describe examples of the features of the area. Descriptions of the following aspects of the area are detailed:local history health,religion,education,law and order,recreation,local government, industry,science and technology, fashion,social concern,housing, ecology,family and a biography of a sports personality.
